title: Tactical Gaming LFM

embed.description: Welcome to Tactical Gaming Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

body:
Welcome to Tactical Gaming. Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

Basically the OCE side of the league of legends division is looking for some new players. Any rank, any level, anybody is welcome. We do 2 mandatory practices a week and in addition some get together for optional practices. If you are more looking for a ranked team experience you can still join and give some of our members a PM as I'm sure they'd be keen to start up a team.

For signing on there is an initial registration which takes about 2 min to do, then someone has to confirm it which may take up to 24 hours. After that there is a boot camp which involves a test. After that you are assigned to a squad and then proceed to start your journey with TG.

Feel free to add me on league client "nezzazuri" if you have any questions/problems, I will be happy to help.
In addition feel free to use "nezzazuri" as a referrer on the registration.
PS OCE is 1st battalion not 2nd

THANKS FOR YOUR TIME!!! SEE YOU ON THE BATTLEFIELD SUMMONERS!!!

Registration link:
www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/index.php?app=core&module=global&section=register

replies.body: Im a TG and OLAF squad still lives to this day <3
Although i'm not in TG myself, I can confirm that squad kha'zix is the most superior squad due to their leader, ChicknyGamin.
